sentences.sContent: He looks more like a stockbroker than a teen idol.
sentences.sContent_eng: He looks more like a stockbroker than a teen idol.
sentences.sCn: 他看起来不像是青少年偶像，而更像个股票经纪人。

sentences.sContent: They would also provide stockbroker services for the public .
sentences.sContent_eng: They would also provide stockbroker services for the public .
sentences.sCn: 他们还可以想公众提供股票经纪人的服务。

sentences.sContent: He bragged that his father was the most successful stockbroker on Wall Street.
sentences.sContent_eng: He bragged that his father was the most successful stockbroker on Wall Street.
sentences.sCn: 他吹嘘他父亲是华尔街上最成功的股票经纪人。

remMethod.val: stock(股票) + broker(经纪人) → 股票经纪人

words.tran: 股份，股票；库存；血统；树干
证券公司；[金融] 股票经纪人；股票投机商

trans.tranOther: a person or organization whose job is to buy and sell  shares  ,  bonds  etc for people
